lst.name: sentence
lst.str: A statutory change to the West German Exchange Admissions Act, which went into effect on May 1, allows such borrowers to file for bourse listing without a prospectus and without an underwriting group.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: They would charge a high premium to borrowers taking up euromarks for swaps as banks have little incentive to take on more expensive euromark liabilities at present.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: If the dollar looks poised to stabilize or rise further, foreign investors in mark eurobonds could switch out of them on the belief that gains from the mark's appreciation were ending, dealers said.

lst.name: sentence
